comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:
The Graslei on the Lys River. Still looks very much like this today.

Photochrom from the LOC P&P Collection:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/trialsanderrors/3387169953/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: I slept overnight there in 1957, at the Hotel St. Georges, an ancient place whose enormous dining hall was crammed with absurdly small suits of armor. (Warriors of the Middle Ages were smaller than us moderns.)

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
trialsanderrors:

Thanks for the much more detailed caption information for the photochrom and therefore for this photograph. We will update the record to reflect this information.
